text: Va khong bao gio cac nguoi co the Ä‘oi xu cong bang voi cac ba vo mac dau cac nguoi rat muon. Boi the, cho hoan toan nghieng han (ve mot ba va bo roi ba khac) nhu la phat treo ba ta. Boi the, neu cac nguoi giai hoa va so Allah thi (cac nguoi se thay) qua that Allah Hang Tha Thu, Rat Muc Khoan Dung
